sentence.Network_en: The length of the bars of the xylophone determines the different notes of the scale.
sentence.Network_cn: 木琴琴键的长度决定音阶的不同音调.

sentence.Network_en: I play the xylophone, fun, fun.
sentence.Network_cn: 我弹起扬琴, 有趣 、 有趣.

entry.def: A xylophone is a musical instrument which consists of a row of wooden bars of different lengths. You play the xylophone by hitting the bars with special hammers.

means.word_mean: 1. a percussion instrument with wooden bars tuned to produce a chromatic scale and with resonators; played with small mallets

sentences.en: to find a peaceful place where sb. can play the xylophone in the moonlight without disturbance
sentences.cn: 找一个能在月光下静静弹琴的地方
